bill.title: Planned Community Associations
bill.description: Conforms planned community association laws with respect to proxies to comparable provisions regulating condominium associations. (SB2222 HD2)

history.action: (S) Introduced.
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to CPN.
(S) The committee(s) on CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 02-23-10 9:00AM in conference room 229.
(S) The committee(s) on CPN has rescheduled its public hearing to 02-23-10 10:00AM in conference room 229.

(S) The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Ige, Espero, Green, Ihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Sakamoto, Hemmings.
(S) Reported from CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2387) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 03-02-10.
(S) Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Bunda). Transmitted to House.
(H) Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 99) in amended form (SD 1).
(H) Pass First Reading
(H) Referred to HSG, CPC/JUD, FIN, referral sheet 33
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by HSG on Wednesday, 03-10-10 10:10AM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on HSG recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Cabanilla, Chong, Chang, Coffman, Herkes, Ito, C. Lee, Sagum, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Morita; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Har, Luke, Ching.
(H) Reported from HSG (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 729-10) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to CPC/JUD.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on CPC/JUD with none voting no (0) and Berg, Keith-Agaran, Manahan, Takumi, Thielen excused (5).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC/JUD on Tuesday, 03-16-10 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Herkes, Wakai, Cabanilla, Ito, Karamatsu, Luke, McKelvey, Mizuno, Tsuji, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti, Carroll, Morita, Souki.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Karamatsu, Ito, Cabanilla, Herkes, Luke, McKelvey, Mizuno, Tsuji, Wakai, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 5 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti, Carroll, Morita, B. Oshiro, Souki.
(H) Reported from CPC/JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 851-10) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.

(H) Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) M. Lee, Yamane voting no and Representative(s) Carroll, Chang, Har, Manahan, Morita, M. Oshiro, Tokioka, Ward excused.
